articles.title: Kim warns of 'serious consequences' if virus spreads to N Korea
articles.description: North Korean leader calls for stronger efforts to guard against the new coronavirus outbreak that has spread globally.
articles.content:
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has called for stronger efforts to guard against coronavirus, saying there will be "serious consequences" if the outbreak spreads to the country.

articles.title: How the coronavirus outbreak is affecting the global economy
articles.description: Will the economic impact of the coronavirus be on par with the 2008 financial crisis? Plus, Argentina and death default.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Amid coronavirus fear, African boxers vie for 2020 Olympic berths
articles.description: In Senegal, Africa's best boxers are still trying to qualify for Tokyo 2020 despite doubts of cancellations because of the coronavirus.
articles.content:
With 146 days to the opening of Tokyo Olympic Games, there are still doubts as to whether it will go ahead because of the coronavirus outbreak.
But athletes around the world are doing all they can to make it to Japan.
Al Jazeera's Nicolas Haque reports from… [+84 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Lebanon asks schools and universities to close over coronavirus
articles.description: The country has so far registered seven cases of the new virus.
articles.content:
Beirut, Lebanon - Lebanon has asked all schools, universities and nurseries to close until March 8 as a precautionary measure against the new coronavirus.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: US reports first death due to coronavirus in Washington state
articles.description: US President Donald Trump says deceased person was a 'medically high-risk patient' in her late 50s.
articles.content:
A woman in her late 50s has died of COVID-19, US President Donald Trump has announced, marking the first death due to the new coronavirus in the country.

articles.title: Fresh details emerge about Nigeria's first coronavirus case
articles.description: Italian man traveled through Lagos to another state before he was put in quarantine, authorities say.
articles.content:
An Italian man who has been confirmed to be Nigeria's first coronavirus case after arriving from Milan was in the country for almost two full days before being isolated, travelling through Lagos and visiting another state.

articles.title: Qatar reports first coronavirus case in citizen who was in Iran
articles.description: The 36-year-old patient is in stable condition, the health ministry said, and had been quarantined since Thursday.
